item.title: Common Voice Armenia: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: Common Voice Armenia was launched in May 2021. This post contains some context on what it is and how you can help. What is Common Voice Armenia? What does the voice corpus look like? What help is needed? How are dialects addressed? Is there a voice corpus for each dialect similar to how the language is split in Wikipedia? About the voice recordings – is it bad if I stutter or re-read a few words?
